tweets.text: #TeamEA have been on site of a pollution to the River Yarrow in Lancashire. Investigations are currently ongoing into the cause of this incident. Our thanks go to members of the public who reported this to our 24/7 incident hotline - 0800 80 70 60 https://t.co/ge57Ds891o

Our officers have today inspected the metal recycling site in Hunslet and surrounding area following the fire yesterday evening. 

No impacts on the local environment have been identified.

We'll work with the site operator to ensure they carry out a safe clean up. https://t.co/GHLQnh9XSF
